00066     void submit_chat(AG_Event *event)
00067     {
00068         IRCServer *chatServer = static_cast<IRCServer*>(AG_PTR(1));
00069         if (chatServer->isConnected())
00070                 {
00071                     AG_Textbox *input = static_cast<AG_Textbox*>(AG_PTR(2));
00072                     AG_Console *output = static_cast<AG_Console*>(AG_PTR(3));
00073 
00074             if (input && output)
00075             {
00076                 std::string chat = AG_TextboxDupString(input);
00077                 if (!chat.empty())
00078                 {
00079                                         if (chat.substr(0, 1) != "/")
00080                                         {
00081                                                 // send message to IRC
00082                                                 IRCMessage *msg = new IRCMessage;
00083                                                 msg->setType(IRCMessage::CHAT);
00084                                                 msg->addString(chat);
00085                                                 chatServer->sendMessage(msg);
00086 
00087                                                 // add message to chat window
00088                                                 chat.insert(0, player->getSelectedCharacter()->getName() + ": ");
00089                         interfaceManager->sendToChat(chat);
00090                                         }
00091                                         else if (chat.substr(1, 3) == "me ")
00092                                         {
00093                                                 IRCMessage *msg = new IRCMessage;
00094                                                 msg->setType(IRCMessage::EMOTE);
00095                                                 msg->addString(chat.substr(4));
00096                                                 chatServer->sendMessage(msg);
00097 
00098                                                 // add message to chat window
00099                                                 chat = chat.substr(4);
00100                                                 chat.insert(0, "* " + player->getSelectedCharacter()->getName() + " ");
00101                                                 interfaceManager->sendToChat(chat);
00102                                         }
00103                 }
00104                                 // clear input textbox
00105                                 AG_TextboxClearString(input);
00106             }
00107         }
00108     }
00109 
00110     void handle_mouse(Event *evt)
00111     {
00112         if (evt->button == SDL_BUTTON_LEFT && evt->type == 0)
00113         {
00114             Node *node = graphicsEngine->getNode(evt->x, evt->y);
00115             if (node)
00116             {
00117                 Being *being = beingManager->findBeing(node->getName());
00118                 if (being)
00119                 {
00120                     being->toggleName();
00121                 }
00122             }
00123         }
00124     }

00126         TestState::TestState()
00127         {
00128         ms = 0;
00129         chatServer = new IRCServer;
00130 
00131                 // create camera
00132                 Rectangle rect;
00133                 rect.height = 768;
00134                 rect.width = 1024;
00135                 rect.x = -512;
00136                 rect.y = 0;
00137                 mCam = new Camera("viewport", &rect);
00138                 graphicsEngine->setCamera(mCam);
00139         }
00140 
00141         void TestState::enter()
00142         {
00143                 int screenWidth = graphicsEngine->getScreenWidth();
00144                 int screenHeight = graphicsEngine->getScreenHeight();
00145 
00146                 AG_Window *chatWindow = AG_WindowNewNamed(AG_WINDOW_NOBUTTONS, "ChatWindow");
00147                 AG_WindowSetCaption(chatWindow, "Chat");
00148                 AG_WindowSetSpacing(chatWindow, 5);
00149                 AG_WindowSetGeometry(chatWindow, 10, screenHeight - 185, 400, 175);
00150                 AG_WindowShow(chatWindow);
00151 
00152         AG_Notebook *book = AG_NotebookNew(chatWindow, AG_NOTEBOOK_EXPAND);
00153         AG_ObjectSetName(book, "ChannelsFolder");
00154         AG_NotebookTab *nbTab = AG_NotebookAddTab(book, "Global Chat", AG_BOX_VERT);
00155         AG_ObjectSetName(nbTab, "GlobalChat");
00156 
00157         AG_Console *console = AG_ConsoleNew(nbTab, AG_CONSOLE_EXPAND);
00158         AG_ObjectSetName(console, "Chat");
00159 
00160                 AG_Textbox *chatInput = AG_TextboxNew(chatWindow, AG_TEXTBOX_CATCH_TAB, NULL);
00161                 AG_TextboxSizeHint(chatInput, "XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX");
00162                 AG_SetEvent(chatInput, "textbox-return", submit_chat, "%p%p%p", chatServer, chatInput, console);
00163 
00164                 // add elements to interface manager
00165                 interfaceManager->addWindow(chatWindow);
00166 
00167                 std::string nick = player->getSelectedCharacter()->getName();
00168                 std::string host = "london.uk.whatnet.org";
00169                 chatServer->setNick(nick);
00170 
00171 #ifndef WITHOUT_CHAT
00172         chatServer->connect(host);
00173 #endif
00174 
00175         // add listener
00176         interfaceManager->addMouseListener(&handle_mouse);
00177         }
00178 
00179         void TestState::exit()
00180         {
00181                 delete mCam;
00182                 delete chatServer;
00183         interfaceManager->removeAllWindows();
00184         interfaceManager->removeMouseListeners();
00185         }
00186 
00187         bool TestState::update()
00188         {
00189                 // Check for input, if escape pressed, exit
00190                 if (inputManager->getKey(SDLK_ESCAPE))
00191                 {
00192             Packet *p = new Packet(PGMSG_DISCONNECT);
00193             networkManager->sendPacket(p);
00194             game->disconnect();
00195                     chatServer->quit();
00196                         return false;
00197                 }
00198 
00199         if (inputManager->getKey(SDLK_DOWN))
00200         {
00201             player->getSelectedCharacter()->setAnimation("maleSEwalk");
00202         }
00203 
00204         if (inputManager->getKey(SDLK_UP))
00205         {
00206             player->getSelectedCharacter()->setAnimation("");
00207         }
00208 
00209         // number of milliseconds since last frame
00210         ms = SDL_GetTicks() - lastframe;
00211         lastframe = SDL_GetTicks();
00212 
00213         // pass the number of milliseconds to logic
00214         beingManager->logic(ms);
00215         player->getSelectedCharacter()->logic(ms);
00216 
00217                 chatServer->process();
00218 
00219                 SDL_Delay(0);
00220 
00221                 return true;
00222         }
00223 }
